trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur has restocking on the agenda.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the Yok Huy supplier at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to the Yok Huy supplier.
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SEQ_03<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Yok Huy supplier at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.

TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.

TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_VUYARGUR_000_000<tab>I'm told the restoration workers residing on the mountain are running low on critical materials. We've a mind to replenish a few daily necessities, if you're willing to contribute.
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>Our supplier at Warmth has but recently taken inventory. He should be able to give you a more detailed report of what we currently lack.

TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_VUYARGUR_000_002<tab>The workers tell me our stock of daily necessities is dwindling yet again. I'd like to resupply our stores as soon as possible─with your invaluable aid, of course.
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_VUYARGUR_000_003<tab>In light of this, I imagine the supplier at Warmth has already taken inventory. He should be able to inform you of the goods we currently lack.
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SUPPLYMANAGER_000_005<tab>With so many restoration workers choosing to dwell here, the demand for living necessities increases by the day... That said, we can barely keep up.

TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SUPPLYMANAGER_000_010<tab>We're sorely in need of silverware, so I'd like to make that our first priority. I've already prepared the necessary materials─you are free to take more from the crate there, should you require it.

TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SUPPLYMANAGER_000_011<tab>We're sorely in need of cleaning cloths, so I'd like to make that our first priority. I've already prepared the necessary materials─you are free to take more from the crate there, should you require it.

TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SUPPLYMANAGER_000_012<tab>We're sorely in need of medicine, so I'd like to make that our first priority. I've already prepared the necessary materials─you are free to take more from the crate there, should you require it.
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>You obtain additional crafting materials from the crate.
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SUPPLYMANAGER_000_039<tab>Ah, you're back. The crafting went smoothly, I take it?
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SUPPLYMANAGER_000_040<tab>Let's see here... Yes, this is just enough! On behalf of our workers, I offer my thanks.

TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SUPPLYMANAGER_000_041<tab>Your presence is a gift to us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and I am sure Vuyargur is of the same mind. I wager he's just as eager to hear of your efforts, so I'll leave you to report the good news to him.
TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_SUPPLYMANAGER_000_042<tab>Thank you again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Now, you'd best be off to Vuyargur. Wouldn't want to keep him waiting, would you?

TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_VUYARGUR_000_050<tab>The restocking went smoothly? Excellent! Many thanks to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The journey from the peaks to Worlar's Echo is a lengthy one, which makes replenishing our supplies a rather thorny task...

TEXT_BANYOK106_05341_VUYARGUR_000_051<tab>Until we are fully self-sufficient, your aid will be vital to us, just as it was today. It is my hope that we can count on you again when next our stores grow scarce.
